#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>

main()
{
int fall, i, j, k, l, m, n, len, dp[23];
char in[200], w[]="welcome to conscientia";
for(scanf("%d\n",&fall); fall--; printf("%d\n",dp[22]))
	{
	for(gets(in),i=!(len=strlen(in)); i<23; dp[i++]=0);
	for(dp[i=0]=1; i<len; i++)
	for(k=22; --k>=0; dp[k+1]=(w[k]==in[i])?(dp[k+1]+dp[k]):dp[k+1]);
	}
return 0;
}
